gallery1.title: Educating Young Minds
gallery1.content: At Bethany we believe education opens the door for success.Our heart goes out for those with limited educational opportunities. We endeavor to provide education through ICT (Information and Communication Technology) centers with books and computers.

about_us.headline1-content: The accidental death of our baby Bethany at age two was agonizing we wish will never happen to any parent. We dealt with the pain of loosing Bethany by helping others. In 2003 we incorporated a charitable organization in California and began work with twelve (12) orphans. We wanted to expand educational opportunities and started and ICT Center where we provide library and educational services. Today we have a library center named after Bethany with two dozen computers and over five thousand books.
about_us.headline2-content: To educate and assist young minds in their quest to become self sufficient and productive citzens.
about_us.headline3-content: Join us in promoting and executing our mission through your financial support.

donate.headline: How funds are used
donate.donate-paragraph: Your financial contribution is used to achieve our mission by educating more young minds. Our services include providing library books, computer access, internet access, and awards for outstanding learners. Your financial contribution helps pay for computers and books, and updating these resources; increases our internet bandwidth to support more children; and expand our services to more locations.
donate.donate-warning: This button below will redirect you to PayPal to accept your donation

project1.author: Dr. Solomon Negash

project2.title: Increasing Knowledge
project2.content: Internet connectivity at our library center is a beacon of light for seeking knowledge. Despite the limited connectivity and bandwidth many appreciate this valuable resource.
project2.author: Thiem
